Articles.Content:
I wasn't trying to break the game... honest

but anyway, I was orbital constructing on the moon using the jump drive, and if you jump but end up inside the moon, end then hit activate space jump (or whatever) then my rocket went back to the launch pad, through kerb in, then shattered and is now travelling at almost 10X THE SPEED OF LIGHT O_O (precisely 2,870,28,296 M/S) he also kind of split into many many pieces... even though he's a kerbal...

and finally, he doesn't appear on the map, as an icon or as a flight path, and all the debris from the same ship are going at the same speed!
lol anyway its not stock so nothimg can be done, orbital contruction is a hack and sometimes it screws up the code

lol anyway its not stock so nothimg can be done, orbital contruction is a hack and sometimes it screws up the code

you don't say! the guys like disintegrating

you don't say! the guys like disintegrating

No he isn't stick him under a big rocket engine and turn it to max,now hes disintegrating
